name: Crew & Lu Pink Tassel Moccasin regular price $62.00
description:
Crew & Lu moccasins are handcrafted with care, made out of Genuine Leather.  Top is quality striped canvas with each tassel delicately made with love.  

These moccasins are designed to fit snug around your little gems feet and have elastic at the opening of the moccs.  All moccasins are easy to put on and easy to take off creating a perfect shoe for your little one to run around in.  Crew & Lu moccasins have a soft sole, molding to your child's feet, mimicking the feel of a bare foot.  Perfect for beginner walkers.

Please note: Each set of moccasins is hand made for you when you order, so please allow 3-6 weeks until they are ready to ship.  If we are speedy we will ship to you as soon as possible.  Thank you for understanding, but we promise, you will love them!

These moccs are handcrafted with love, therefore, pattern placement may vary slightly from the moccs pictured.  Also for phone screens, computer screens, etc. may not always depict colors exactly as you see them in person. 

The Moccasins fit true to size. They come in children sizes 0-3 Months (US size 1), 3-6 Months (US size 2), 6-12 Months (US size 3/4), 12-18 Months (US size 5/6), 18-24 Months (US size 6/7), 2t/3t (US size 8/9), 3t/4t (US size 10/11).  

***Please leave your size request in comments section when checking out.***

name: Pink Ombre Bow Hat
description:
Hat made with 100% organic cotton fabric.
This is an exclusive Crew & Lu hexagon design direct to garment printed on 100% USA organic cotton interlock, and seams are professionally serged for durability.

Please note, these hats are handcrafted with love, therefore, pattern placement may vary slightly from the headbands pictured.  Also for different screens as in phone screens, computer screens, etc. may not always depict colors exactly as you see them in person. 

Care instructions: 
Machine wash, delicate cycle (we recommend using phosphate free detergents to preserve color) tumble dry low or line dry.

These hats are made to order, please allow 2-4 weeks for delivery. If we are speedy, we will ship out as soon as possible!

Please note, these leggings are handcrafted with love, therefore, pattern placement may vary slightly from the leggings pictured.  Also for different screens as in phone screens, computer screens, etc. may not always depict colors exactly as you see them in person. 

Care instructions: 
Machine wash, delicate cycle (we recommend using phosphate free detergents to preserve color) tumble dry low or line dry.

These leggings are made to order, please allow 3-4 weeks for delivery.  If we are speedy, we will ship out as soon as possible!
